description: Sunny apartment centrally located - within walking distance to Broadway, Times Square, Central Park, all subway lines, Restaurants, MOMA, Whole Foods & so much more. A very sunny apartment with floor to ceiling windows, doorman, elevator, gym, decorated with quality furniture, in a beautiful award winning architectural building. For a couple or solo adventurer.
name: DESIGNER STUDIO
review:
Ottima esperienza, l'appartamento era ottimo, come da descrizione, posizione ottima, prezzo adeguato e ottimo contesto.
Elizabeth è stata gentilissima, ci tornerei  e lo consiglio a tutti.
